web_snippets: Farooq Kathwari (born 1944), is a Kashmiri-American businessman and philanthropist who is the Chairman, CEO, and President of Ethan Allen Interiors.
Farooq A. Mitha served in the Biden administration as the Director of the Department of Defense (DoD) Office of Small Business Programs (OSBP).
Personal Life. Farooq is a dedicated family man and an advocate for cultural preservation. He has actively participated in the Ojude Oba ...
